column2: India s Snapdeal founders Nexus reach deal with SoftBank for sale to Flipkart TV
column3: Founders of Indian online marketplace Snapdeal and one of its early investors Nexus have reached an agreement with SoftBank Group that would allow the Japanese firm to move ahead with its plan to sell Snapdeal to bigger rival Flipkart ET Now reported citing sources

column2: Japan South Korea leaders agree on early summit cooperation on North Korea
column3: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and South Korea s new president Moon Jae in agreed on Thursday to work together closely in dealing with North Korea s nuclear and missile development and to hold a bilateral summit meeting at an early date a senior Japanese government spokesman said
